Privacy Policy for Auto Vin Experts:

At Auto Vin Experts, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to safeguard your information.

Information We Collect
We collect basic information such as your name, email address, and Vehicle Identification Number (VIN). We do not share your information with anyone. Your data will be securely stored and automatically deleted from our database within one month.

We Do Not Share Your Information
We do not share, sell, or rent your personal information to any third-party marketing agencies or individuals. Your data will be securely stored and automatically deleted from our database within one month. If someone forces you to purchase reports from our website, please be aware that we have no affiliation or contact with them.

Data Security
We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access. We use PayPal’s secure gateway for payment processing, ensuring your money is in safe hands and securely encrypted.

Your Rights
You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at info@AutoVinExperts.com.

Refund Policy for Auto Vin Experts:

At Auto Vin Experts, we strive to provide accurate and timely reports. Due to the nature of our virtual products, we have a strict refund policy.

Non-Refundable Products
Once you have received your report, you are not eligible for a refund. Our reports are virtual products, and we reserve the right to exempt refunds. Therefore, please do not waste time disputing or fighting over this policy.

Refund Eligibility
You may only appeal for a refund if:

  • Non-Delivery of Report: If you did not receive the report via email, you may request a refund. Please check your spam or junk folders before contacting us.

By using our services, you agree to this Refund Policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us before making a purchase.
